document.full_text: three years after making a similarly spectacular start to the season, novak djokovic believes he has struck an ideal balance between on-court success and enjoyment away from the game.
document.title: djokovic finds better balance on and off court
lines_and_colors: three years after making a similarly spectacular start to the season, novak djokovic believes he has struck an ideal balance between on-court success and enjoyment away from the game.
